column4: Hi everyone, I've set up a shared folder in my virtual box to use in windows XP but when I try to add it in win xp, it can not find share
never had such problem, are you sure you're on last version of additions
When I installed win xp in the virtual box, I don't remember anything asking me to install additional driver, did I miss it ?
after installing xp when you install additions it warns you about unsigned drivers
, ron85, can you tell me the steps I need to do please ?
open Devices menu and choose Install Gust Additions, then open CDROM :)
, ron85, is there a difference between virtualbox and vm ?
, ron85, because when I type leftctrl+d in virtualbox, it opens the virtual media manager, not the device menu
use 'Device' menu if you're in QT interface
: I am in the virtualbox visual interface, I can not see the device menu anywhere
: maybe I can show you a screenshot of what I see ?
I have 3 menus in virtual machine window: Machine, Devices, and Help
you need to power it up first
aaaaah kkk, thanks for your patience
